name: Ankur Burman
about: An experienced Regional Business Head with a strong background in marketing, known for driving growth and leading successful teams. Skilled in negotiation, business planning, and customer service, he excels at crafting strategies that increase sales and market reach.

name: Pushp R Agrawal
post: State Vice President -UP CBSE School Managers Association
about: He is a dedicated educator and award-winning leader with a strong background in educational leadership and school management. He is deeply committed to enhancing the quality of school education through mentorship, teacher training, and innovative leadership development.

name: Ankit Kushwaha
post: Advocate at Supreme Court of India
about: He is a passionate education reformer and school owner, dedicated to revolutionizing the education landscape in Banda, Uttar Pradesh. With a background in law and experience at the Supreme Court of India, he is committed to integrating modern teaching methodologies with traditional values

name: Saroj Pandey
post: Coordinator for Classes 11 & 12 at Sunbeam English School
about: She has been instrumental in managing academics, examinations, and student activities. Her leadership ensures a well-rounded educational experience, fostering both academic excellence and personal growth in senior students.

name: Raman Pruthi
post: Cluster Business Manager, Higher Education at Pearson
about: A seasoned sales professional with 17+ years in Education and Finance, recognized for exceptional results in team management, CRM, and business growth. Awarded multiple times for top performance and setting industry benchmarks.

name: Mala Tandon
post: Professor,Dy. Director & HOI. Amity Institute of Education, Lucknow
about: She is an experienced education leader who has directed B.Ed. programs, trained faculty, and led academic initiatives, driving excellence in her roles as Director and HoD. Her leadership has driven innovation and excellence in education.

name: Nitin Gaur
about: As a dynamic school owner, life coach trainer, and engineer, He combines technical expertise with a passion for education and personal development. With a strong foundation in engineering, He has successfully applied analytical thinking to create innovative learning environments.

name: Poonam Gupta
about: She is dedicated to nurturing every child's potential, emphasising holistic education, innovation, and sustainability. She leads a collaborative environment where students thrive, teachers innovate, and the entire community works together to achieve excellence.

name: Anuradha Bhatia
about: She is an accomplished educational leader with extensive experience as a Principal and Deputy Director in multiple prestigious institutions. She excels in academic supervision, faculty training, and curriculum development, driving innovation and excellence in education.

name: Rajaneesh Singh
about: With a strong background in economics and an MBA, He is a seasoned educator and leader with 17 years of experience in education and is  an NTA City Coordinator and a CBSE resource person. He is dedicated to fostering academic excellence and providing valuable resources and guidance to educators and students alike.
